body_html:
I have this error with scan too, on nightly build (version is 0.10.0)
I.e.

InvalidArgumentError                      Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-10-dc172f44e124> in <module>()
      1 with tf.Session() as sess:
----> 2     sess.run(init)
      3 
      4     # Training cycle
      5     for epoch in range(training_epochs):

    917       results = []

    964       return self._do_call(_run_fn, self._session, feed_dict, fetch_list,
--> 965                            target_list, options, run_metadata)
    966     else:

    984           pass
--> 985       raise type(e)(node_def, op, message)
    986 
    987   def _extend_graph(self):

InvalidArgumentError: All inputs to node scan_1/while/Variable_1/Assign must be from the same frame.
